summary:
Embark on a new quest, one which will see intrigue, romance, and betrayal. But will it lead to destruction?

Playtime: Around 1 hour to 1 1/2 hours.
Environments: 7 new interiors created.
Characters: 7 new characters, all voiced.
Rewards: Completely unique reward, not available in the base game.
descriptionHtml:
In the land of Skyrim, you will see many things; fame, riches, dragons. But what you see next may be too much for the young Dovahkiin to handle. Play as the Dragonborn as you witness... a lovers' quarrel! The small print, of course, includes the end of the world! But you guessed that, already. Oh! And there's a giant horse! What more could you want?

To begin the quest, simply travel to the Whiterun Stables and walk up into Whiterun where a courier will meet you.

Playtime: This quest should take around 60 to 90 minutes to complete, depending on how much exploring you do.
Environments: There are three big environments created for this mod, with 7 new cells being created in total.
Characters: Four main characters have been created (7 total) and are all voiced.
Rewards: You will be rewarded with some unique abilities, nothing available in the base game.

Mod created by Andrew McAtominey, Andrew Hodgson, and Blake Marriott. 

Female Voice Acting by Gina Reedy. Find her on YouTube here:[url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmzZrZBUffEW5BbZjIj-Sdw?&ab_channel=RavenSiren]https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmzZrZBUffEW5BbZjIj-Sdw?&ab_channel=RavenSiren[/url]
author: Andrew McAtominey
